mutants.original_line: s = ''.join(char for char in s if char.isalpha())
mutants.mutated_line: s = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in s if char.isalpha()))
mutants.code:
import string

def reverse_and_convert(s):
    s = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in s if char.isalpha()))
    s = s[::-1]
    s = s.swapcase()
    return s

def reverse_and_convert(s):

    s = s[::+1]
    s = s.swapcase()
    return s

import string

def reverse_and_convert(s):
    s = ''.join((char for char in s if char.isalpha()))
    s = s[::--1]
    s = s.swapcase()
    return s
